defaultLocale.name: Certificate Patrol
defaultLocale.description: Monitor and compare certificates your application adopts for encrypted HTTPS web sites.
defaultLocale.creator: Aiko Barz, tg, 20after4 and symlynX

locales.description: Osserva come il tuo web browser adotta ed aggiorna certificati di tutti i siti HTTPS.

locales.name: Perspectives
locales.description: Umgeht HTTPS Sicherheitswarnungen auf sichere Weise, indem die Zertifikate mit Hilfe einer Liste von Netzwerknotaren überprüft werden. Siehe http://www.perspectives-project.org (englischsprachig)..
locales.creator: Perspectives Projekt der Carnegie Mellon Computer Science

locales.name: Perspectives
locales.description: Connect securely to https websites by checking certificates with network notaries. See http://www.perspectives-project.org
locales.creator: Perspectives Project at Carnegie Mellon Computer Science

locales.name: Perspectives
locales.description: Conéctese de forma segura con los sitios web que utilizan el protocolo HTTPS, validando sus certificados por medio de notarías de red. Vea http://www.perspectives-project.org
locales.creator: Perspectives Project at Carnegie Mellon Computer Science

locales.name: Perspectives
locales.description: Connectez-vous de façon plus sécurisée sur les sites Internet https en vérifiant leurs certificats avec les notaires de réseau. Consultez http://www.perspectives-project.org (en anglais) pour en savoir plus.
locales.creator: Perspectives est un projet de la section programmation informatique de l'université Carnegie Mellon

locales.name: Perspectives
locales.description: Łącz się bezpiecznie ze stronami HTTPS, sprawdzając certyfikaty przy użyciu sieciowych notariuszy. Sprawdź http://www.perspectives-project.org
locales.creator: Projekt Perspectives z wydziału informatycznego Uniwersytetu Carnegie Mellon

locales.name: Perspectives
locales.description: 使用网络认证检查安全证书，从而安全地连接到 https 网站。请查看 http://www.perspectives-project.org
locales.creator: Perspectives Project at Carnegie Mellon Computer Science

defaultLocale.name: HTTPS-Everywhere
defaultLocale.description: Encrypt the Web! Automatically use HTTPS security on many sites.
defaultLocale.creator: Mike Perry, Peter Eckersley, & Yan Zhu

defaultLocale.name: NoScript
defaultLocale.description: Extra protection for your Firefox: NoScript allows JavaScript, Java (and other plugins) only for trusted domains of your choice (e.g. your home-banking web site). This whitelist based pre-emptive blocking approach  prevents exploitation of security vulnerabilities (known and even unknown!) with no loss of functionality... Experts will agree: Firefox is really safer with NoScript :-)
defaultLocale.creator: Giorgio Maone
contributors: Alexander Sokolov and Sergei Smirnov (Russian translation)
Engin Yazılan, Erkan Kaplan & Fathi  (Turkish translation)
X.F Mao & George C. Tsoi (Simplified Chinese)

defaultLocale.name: RequestPolicy
defaultLocale.description: Control which cross-site requests are allowed. Improve the privacy of your browsing. Secure yourself from Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) and other attacks.
defaultLocale.creator: Justin Samuel
contributors: Aleksej R. Serdjukov kaj babilejanoj (Esperanto translation)

locales.name: Cookie Monster
locales.description: Estensione per la gestione completa dei cookie
